mapper.select: SELECT booking_no FROM booking ORDER BY user_no = #{userNo} DESC LIMIT 1;
SELECT booking_no FROM booking ORDER BY user_no2 = #{userNo2} DESC LIMIT 1;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ticket ( pin_type, passenger_no, passenger_name, route_no, booking_no, booking_no2, departure, destination, departure_date, destination_date, departure_time, destination_time, duration, boarding, checked_in, is_boarded, seat_no, flight_no, phone, user_pw, user_id ) VALUES ( #{pinType}, #{passengerNo}, #{passengerName}, #{routeNo}, #{bookingNo}, #{bookingNo2}, #{departure}, #{destination}, #{departureDate}, #{destinationDate}, #{departureTime}, #{destinationTime}, #{duration}, #{boarding}, #{checkedIn}, #{isBoarded}, #{seatNo}, #{flightNo}, #{phone}, #{userPw}, #{userId} )

INSERT INTO passengers ( product_no_dep, product_no_des, passenger_name, first_name, last_name, gender, pin_type, birth, phone, email ) VALUES ( #{productNoDep}, #{productNoDes}, #{passengerName}, #{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{gender}, #{pinType}, #{birth}, #{phone}, #{email} )

INSERT INTO passengers ( product_no_dep, product_no_des, route_no_dep, route_no_des, passenger_name, first_name, last_name, gender, pin_type, birth, phone, email, user_pw ) VALUES ( #{productNoDep}, #{productNoDes}, #{routeNoDep}, #{routeNoDes}, #{passengerName}, #{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{gender}, #{pinType}, #{birth}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{userPw} )
mapper.select: SELECT *, CONCAT(departure, ' → ', destination) AS name FROM ticket WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY ticket_no DESC
SELECT booking_no , departure , destination , departure_date , seat_no FROM ticket WHERE booking_no = #{bookingNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO booking ( name, user_no, user_no2, product_no, route_no, product_id, pas_count, round_trip, status, seat_no ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{userNo}, #{userNo2}, #{productNoDep}, #{routeNoDep}, #{productIdDep}, #{pasCount}, #{roundTrip}, #{status}, #{seatNo} )

INSERT INTO booking ( name, user_no, user_no2, product_no, route_no, product_id, pas_count, round_trip, status, seat_no ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{userNo}, #{userNo2}, #{productNoDes}, #{routeNoDes}, #{productIdDes}, #{pasCount}, #{roundTrip}, #{status}, #{seatNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM passengers ps left join product p on ps.product_no_dep = p.product_no left join route r on ps.route_no_dep = r.route_no WHERE passenger_name = #{name} AND passenger_no = #{passengerNo};
SELECT * FROM passengers ps left join product p on ps.product_no_des = p.product_no left join route r on ps.route_no_des = r.route_no WHERE passenger_name = #{name} AND passenger_no = #{passengerNo};
